posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe Drouillard
Hello Everyone,

I got a couple of doubles. I have for sale or trade two T206s:

Mike Donlin Seated, N.Y. Nats, Piedmont 150, Graded PSA3 $40.00 or trade for a T206 that I do not have of equal value.
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/003-8.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/004-8.jpg[/IMG]

Wilbur Goode, Cleveland, Sweet Caporal 150 Overprint, Ungraded, No creases, but a small strip of paper loss on the back top border $30.00 or trade for a T206 that I do not have of equal value.
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/001-5.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/002-8.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks for looking,

Joe
